summary: Tested and verified the Figma MCP server configuration. The MCP server is fully functional with all 37 tools available. Successfully tested connection to socket server on port 3055, joined channel '25tfleg5', and verified command execution. Created comprehensive test results document (FIGMA_MCP_TEST_RESULTS.md) with all available tools, usage instructions, and troubleshooting guide. The system is ready for production use in Cursor.
current_status: Figma MCP server is configured and working correctly. Socket server running on port 3055, MCP server instances active, and all tools accessible. The configuration in ~/.cursor/mcp.json is correct and the server successfully connects to Figma Linux (dev) via the socket bridge. Ready for integration into Cursor workflows.
